org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.validate.query

Class ValidateQueryRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.ContextHolder
      • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportMessage<TransportRequest>
        • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportRequest
          • org.elasticsearch.action.ActionRequest<T>
            • org.elasticsearch.action.support.broadcast.BroadcastOperationRequest<ValidateQueryRequest>
              • org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.validate.query.ValidateQueryRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndicesRequest, IndicesRequest.Replaceable, Streamable

    public class ValidateQueryRequest
extends BroadcastOperationRequest<ValidateQueryRequest>
    A request to validate a specific query.

    The request requires the query source to be set either using source(QuerySourceBuilder), or source(byte[]).
